description:
The proposed alliance between the Straw Hats and Bege unfolds! A gaseous blast from the past, Gastino, a member of Bege`s team, reveals the secret weapon that the team plans to use against the Emperor! But Gastino is not who he seems, and the bait in this trap is none other than Luffy himself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Accord mortel. Luffy et Bege allient leurs forces !
Ein tödlicher Pakt! – Ruffy und Beges verbündete Truppe!
Shi no Kyoutei: Luffy & Bege Rengougun!
The Deadly Pact! Luffy & Bege`s Allied Forces!
Смертельный договор! Объединённые силы Луффи и Бега!
المعاهدة المميتة! تحالف قوّات لوفي وبيجي!
死の協定 ルフィ&ベッジ連合軍!
